name: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
description: Randy Marsh becomes a social pariah after saying "niggers" on Wheel of Fortune, which leads to tensions between Token and Stan. Meanwhile, Cartman angers a dwarf who comes to give a talk at the school.

name: Cartman Sucks
description: Butters is sent to a religious camp for sexually confused children after his father catches him in a compromising position with Cartman.

name: Lice Capades
description: An infestation of head lice plagues South Park Elementary, and Cartman spearheads a campaign to find out who has lice so they can make fun of the unfortunate kid. The lice in Clyde's head try to escape when most of their kind are killed by lice shampoo.

name: The Snuke
description: Hillary Clinton is in town for a big campaign rally, and discovers that her vagina has been rigged with a bomb. Cartman suspects a new Muslim kid at school might be responsible for the bomb planted.

name: Fantastic Easter Special
description: Determined to get the real story behind why eggs are decorated for Easter, Stan ends up involved with an eccentric society that guards a legendary secret.

name: D-Yikes!
description: In a parody of 300, Mrs. Garrison falls for a woman at a lesbian bar and fights Persians to keep the bar from being renovated. Meanwhile, Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny hire illegal immigrants to do their homework for them.

name: Night of the Living Homeless
description: Masses of homeless people invade South Park. The parents of South Park are trapped on a rooftop, while the children trace the cause of the epidemic.

name: Le Petit Tourette
description: Cartman pretends to have Tourette syndrome so he can say whatever he wants without being punished, but faking the condition begins to wear on his mental filter.

name: More Crap
description: Randy becomes South Park's hometown hero when the guys down at the local bar see the size of his most recent feces.

name: Imaginationland Episode I
description: Part one of three. Terrorists attack Imaginationland, in an attempt to take over peoples' imagination. Meanwhile, Cartman makes a bet with Kyle that if leprechauns are real, Kyle will suck Cartman's balls. Cartman wins, and Kyle is stuck in a dilemma.

name: Imaginationland Episode II
description: Part two of three. Stan and Kyle are being held in the Pentagon until they tell the government how they got into Imaginationland. Meanwhile, Cartman goes to great lengths to get Kyle to suck his balls after the leprechaun bet.

name: Imaginationland Episode III
description: Conclusion. Inside Imaginationland, Stan and Butters engage in the battle of their lives as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces alongside what's left of the good imaginary people led by Aslan. Kyle tries to save Stan and Butters from Imaginationland, and Cartman once again goes to great lengths to get Kyle to suck his balls.

name: Guitar Queer-O
description: Stan and Kyle are both hooked on Guitar Hero, which drives a wedge in their friendship.

name: The List
description: The girls in the fourth grade class make a secret list that rates every boy's looks from cutest to ugliest. The fourth grade boys discover this and steal the list. They are, however, unprepared to deal with the results. Stan and Wendy reconcile after their break up while trying to solve the list mystery.
